name: TowerSth
description:
An unfinished project that will hopefully be finished later.

  • MouseClick0 on buttons with colors to create a block. Hover them over a cell and MouseClick0 to place.
  • Use LeftShift+MouseClick0 to remove a placed block.
  • Use Alt+F4 to close.

Team:

  • Deniz Koçak - Game Developer & 3D and Material Artist
  • İrem Aydındoğan - UI Developer
  • Uğur Önal - Game Designer & Game Developer
